Title: The Cold Does Bother Them, Actually
Description:
If there is one thing I have learned in my years as a seamstress, $p, it is that adventurers will always underestimate the cold.

I have explorers in the Azure Span begging me for warmer robes.

Would you take pity on them and craft a few?
ObjectivesText: Craft 2 Surveyor's Cloth Robes for Fulafong in Valdrakken.
